Text.Language: Hiten nip~recbia n~te nio~u/b n~te ]meym/i pijout f~tou m~p~recbuteroc: P[oic a~rih~mot nan m~pi,w e~bol n~te nennobi.
Through the intercessions of the priests of the truth: the twenty-four presbyters: O Lord, grant us the forgiveness of our sins.
